segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely focused on the plate she is drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel surprised that she doesn’t notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is steadily growing, and yet she seems utterly oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the steady stream of water running down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something oddly serene about the way the kitchen seems untouched by chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only she knew the trouble brewing just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, yet inside, things are about to change.
segments.speaker: PAR
